attributes.action: Make Birmingham the new capital of the Uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
why Birmingham should be made the new capital of the Uk instead of London :

1) It has the best road system in the uk with no congestion charges making the transport system.
2)cheaper cost of living so it keeps the economy on a even keel.
3)we have some of the best business brains in the country which will improve trade with europe and the western world.
So inconclusion there is my 4 point plan for making Birmingham the new capital of the uk

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
